definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Listing 2. A smaller trim threshold might save space.
sentences.chinese: 一个更小的内存消减阈值可能节省内存空间。

sentences.english: Finally, the filtered image is thresholded to produce the edge image.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对滤波图像阈值化以得到噪声图像的边缘图。

sentences.english: What thresholds can you change here to influence this activity?
sentences.chinese: 更改哪些阈值可以影响这种活动呢？

sentences.english: If this threshold is exceeded, an alert is sent to the notification list.
sentences.chinese: 如果超过了该阈值，则会向通知列表发送警报。

sentences.english: The experiment was conducted to estimate the economic injury level (EIL) and economic threshold (ET) of B. tabaci.
sentences.chinese: 研究了烟粉虱在黄瓜上的经济损害水平和经济阈值。

sentences.english: The results of this paper can provide some reference for the development of the low threshold, high-precision stray light measurement system.
sentences.chinese: 为低阈值，高精度杂散光测量系统的研制奠定基础。

sentences.english: And the threshold voltage of LCD decreases with the increase of the anchoring.
sentences.chinese: 液晶盒的阈值电压随锚定强度的增大而减小。

sentences.english: The yellow and red line on the chart above represents the alert thresholds.
sentences.chinese: 图中，黄色和红色的线条表示警戒阈值。

sentences.english: If this value is above a certain threshold, you will automatically place an order for this stock.
sentences.chinese: 如果该值大于某个阈值，您将自动对此股票下单。

sentences.english: Musicians had no advantage when it came to pure tone thresholds.
sentences.chinese: 当涉及纯音阈值时音乐家没有优势。

sentences.english: The concept of heat threshold is brought forward for the melting process of radioactive source with constant heat rate.
sentences.chinese: 针对恒释热率热源接触熔化，提出了热量阈值的概念。

sentences.english: Behavior threshold of audibility are usually computed with the threshold of V - wave reaction.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定中主要根据其V波反应阈值来评估主观听阈。

sentences.english: In this window, you can define a threshold for this chart.
sentences.chinese: 在这个窗口中，您可以为此图表定义一个阈值。

sentences.english: At last, the suggest for improving the laser induced damage thresholds on optical materials was given.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了提高光学材料激光损伤阈值的方法。

sentences.english: The methods of laser damage detection and laser induced damage threshold(LIDT) were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了激光损伤的检测及损伤阈值的测量方法。

sentences.english: Before starting exception processing you need to define a threshold set.
sentences.chinese: 在开始异常处理之前，您需要定义一个阈值集。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
